tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: India is a land of diverse cultures, languages, and traditions, showcasing a rich tapestry of heritage, art, music, and festivals.

tidbits.title: Historical Marvels
tidbits.description: The country boasts magnificent historical marvels like the Taj Mahal, ancient temples, forts, and palaces, reflecting its glorious past.

tidbits.title: Spiritual Haven
tidbits.description: India is a spiritual haven, with sacred sites like Varanasi and Rishikesh, and a deep-rooted philosophy of yoga, meditation, and spirituality.
